title: Generating Unique Identifiers in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will explore how to generate a UUID in a browser using JavaScript. A UUID (Universally Unique Identifier) is a 128-bit value used to identify resources in a system in a way that is both unique and universal. By the end of this lab, you will have a clear understanding of how to generate a compliant UUID that can be used in your web applications.

meta.title: Generate Unique Identifiers | Browser JavaScript Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to generate UUIDs (Universally Unique Identifiers) in a browser using JavaScript, following the RFC4122 standard. Enhance your web application with unique and universal resource identification.
meta.keywords: UUID, JavaScript, Browser, Unique Identifier, Web Development, Tutorial

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 在JavaScript中生成唯一标识符
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何使用JavaScript在浏览器中生成UUID。UUID（通用唯一识别码）是一个128位的值，用于以一种既唯一又通用的方式在系统中识别资源。在本实验结束时，你将清楚地了解如何生成一个可用于你的Web应用程序的合规UUID。

meta.title: 生成唯一标识符 | 浏览器JavaScript教程
meta.description: 学习如何使用JavaScript在浏览器中按照RFC4122标准生成UUID（通用唯一识别码）。通过唯一且通用的资源标识来增强你的Web应用程序。
meta.keywords: UUID, JavaScript, 浏览器, 唯一标识符, 网页开发, 教程

verify.name: 验证Node命令的使用
verify.hint: 通过在终端/SSH中输入'node'并按回车键，可以运行JavaScript。
